name: Hobo Haemorrhage
description:
This is Hobo Haemorrhage

Heavily inspired by call of duty zombies.
We made this for a 4-day game jam and really enjoyed making it so we are uploading it to itch to see if people would like this sort of game and if they do we will rewrite it and make it as high quality as we can.

Thanks for any downloads and feedback!


 - Controls -

W - Move Up                                                 

A  - Move left

S - Move Down            

D - Move Right

E - Interact/Buy/Start game on the ticket machine.

R - Reload Gun                                         

Left click - Shoot
